name: Fishery (itch)
description:
A 2D platformer fishing RPG in which you catch fish. Buy and find upgrades to go deeper and catch even more fish. Find the elusive Golden egg by fishing in the deepest waters.

Instructions:

  • A/D = Move
  • W/S  = Reel/Unreel line (when there is a lure on it)
  • X = Quit fishing (any hooked fish are lost)
  • Space = Jump
  • Q = Cycle through owned lures (when you have some)
  • LMB + Mouse movement = Moves fishing pole

Tips:

  • Reel Items all the way in to get them
  • A rod without a lure is easier to carry...

Notes:

  • Line physics are not meant to be "real-word"
